metadata.title: CVE-2017-3653 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server component of Oracle MySQL (subcomponent:Server: DDL). Supported versions that are affected are 5.5.56 and earlier,5.6.36 and earlier and 5.7.18 and earlier. Difficult to exploitvulnerability allows low privileged attacker with network access viamultiple protocols to compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of thisvulnerability can result in unauthorized update, insert or delete access tosome of MySQL Server accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 3.1 (Integrityimpacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:H/PR:L/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3653` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmariadbd18 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-client-core-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-common - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-connect - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-mroonga - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-oqgraph - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-spider - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-plugin-tokudb - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-server-core-10.0 - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mariadb-test-data - 10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client - 5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-common - 5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server - 5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mariadb-10.0 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '10.0.36-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
mysql-5.7 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.19-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
percona-server-5.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
